name: img-refactor
description: Auto image compression, WebP conversion, and reference replacement CLI
author: wdm

scripts.release: npm whoami >/dev/null 2>&1 || npm login && npm pack && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release
